title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 17.11 - Manufactured desserts mix: identity; label statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 17.11 - Manufactured desserts mix: identity; label statement

State Regulations
(a) Manufactured desserts mix, whipped cream
confection, bisque tortoni means a frozen dessert made with milk products, sweetening agents, flavoring agents, with or without harmless coloring or any
other safe and suitable ingredients approved by the commissioner. The product
must contain not less than 18 per centum by weight of milkfat, and not more
than 12 per centum of milk solids not fat, and may be packaged with harmless
gas causing it to fluff upon ejection from the package or container. (b) In addition to all other required
information, the label shall contain a complete list of ingredients, in
accordance with the provisions of
21 CFR
101.4. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
17.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
